# HMError.Code.readOnlyCharacteristic

**Case**

An attempt to modify a read-only value.

## Declaration

```swift
case readOnlyCharacteristic
```

## Characteristic errors

- **HMError.Code.writeOnlyCharacteristic**: An attempt to read from a write-only characteristic.

items.description: An attempt to read from a write-only characteristic.
